scripts.build:all: npm run build:core && npm run build:renderer && npm run build:products && npm run build:viewer && npm run build:font-loader && npm run build:editor && npm run build:themes && npm run build:shop && npm run build:text-editor
scripts.link:core: cd ./dist/libs/core && npm link && cd ../../../ && npm link @pe/builder-core
scripts.link:api: cd ./dist/libs/api && npm link && cd ../../../ && npm link @pe/builder-api
scripts.link:renderer: cd ./dist/libs/renderer && npm link && cd ../../../ && npm link @pe/builder-renderer
scripts.link:viewer: cd ./dist/libs/viewer && npm link && cd ../../../ && npm link @pe/builder-viewer
scripts.link:editor: cd ./dist/libs/editor && npm link && cd ../../../ && npm link @pe/builder-editor
scripts.link:themes: cd ./dist/libs/themes && npm link && cd ../../../ && npm link @pe/builder-themes
scripts.link:shop: cd ./dist/libs/shop && npm link && cd ../../../ && npm link @pe/builder-shop
scripts.link:text-editor: cd ./dist/libs/text-editor && npm link && cd ../../../ && npm link @pe/builder-text-editor
scripts.link:products: cd ./dist/libs/products && npm link && cd ../../../ && npm link @pe/builder-products
scripts.link:media: cd ./dist/libs/media && npm link && cd ../../../ && npm link @pe/builder-media
scripts.link:font-loader: cd ./dist/libs/font-loader && npm link && cd ../../../ && npm link @pe/builder-font-loader
scripts.init:core: npm run build:core && npm run link:core
scripts.init:api: npm run build:api && npm run link:api
scripts.init:renderer: npm run build:renderer && npm run link:renderer
scripts.init:viewer: npm run build:viewer && npm run link:viewer
scripts.init:editor: npm run build:editor && npm run link:editor
scripts.init:themes: npm run build:themes && npm run link:themes
scripts.init:shop: npm run build:shop && npm run link:shop
scripts.init:text-editor: npm run build:text-editor && npm run link:text-editor
scripts.init:products: npm run build:products && npm run link:products
scripts.init:media: npm run build:media && npm run link:media
scripts.init:font-loader: npm run build:font-loader && npm run link:font-loader
scripts.init:all: npm run init:core && npm run init:api && npm run init:media  && npm run init:font-loader && npm run init:text-editor && npm run init:renderer && npm run init:products && npm run init:viewer && npm run init:editor && npm run init:themes && npm run init:shop
